plot: The fickle fiancé of a beautiful heiress is led to believe that she has been disfigured for life, and breaks the engagement. The right man stands the test and is rewarded.
title: A Streak of Yellow
plot_es: The fickle fiancé of a beautiful heiress is led to believe that she has been disfigured for life, and breaks the engagement. The right man stands the test and is rewarded.
plot_en: The fickle fiancé of a beautiful heiress is led to believe that she has been disfigured for life, and breaks the engagement. The right man stands the test and is rewarded.
